name: chronic crisis
description:
When the time became intense in early 2020, and the crisis happened a real danger could potentially cause more death parallel with that even more than the impacts of COVID-19.  
Now, with the COVID-19 pandemic, the global hunger crisis stands to grow and threaten the lives of more vulnerable communities across the world and why we shouldn't consider this chronic crisis that has been recurring constantly as we have the remedy for it. 
Based on this problem, I developed this campaign to show why we shouldn't use what we have against this chronic crisis.
